name: Country
description: Deny access based on the country of the client IP.

BLACKLIST_COUNTRY.help: Deny access if the country of the client is in the list (2 letters code).
BLACKLIST_COUNTRY.label: Country blacklist

WHITELIST_COUNTRY.help: Deny access if the country of the client is not in the list (2 letters code).
WHITELIST_COUNTRY.label: Country whitelist
